title: Summer Splash Art Contest Winners - Sponsored by Wacom

replies.body: That Lifesaver Taliyah skin looks awesome, would totally instant-buy that as a Taliyah main haha
;D awe thanks, that means a lot ahah
I love the 2nd one, so hungry right now. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Yours is amazing too, I loved the concept of making it a holiday photo!

I've spent the week running around the office and pointing out to other Rioters - in the background of Skizanity's piece, you can see the exact positioning of two of the Pool Party splashes. It's a really cool detail. >:D

> [{quoted}](name=CrimsonSeal,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=zouEka1B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-19T05:39:03.371+0000)

Thanks CrimsonSeal!
Hey.... I'm sure uve got a lot of spare rp... On an unrelated note, add me?
The Summer Gangplank BBQ looks so cooooool. {{champion:41}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Follow my instagram and artstation @ianzhouart to see more of my work!
Second was better than the first in my opinion, first just had more characters.
I'm surprised no-one has done something with Azir. There needs to be one with him being buried in the sand by someone.

Funny enough I was going to do Azir but I ended up doing GP instead. Was going to dress Azir in cruise captains outfit.
Lee sin pretending he is blind again
Wowww so goodd!! Was hoping no one would submit anything so I could win. Oce exceeded expectations!!!

I love them all... :DDDD
That Summer Bod Volibear is just what my life needs right now.
umm there is no volibear in any of these pictures>..??????????????????
Hey. If you want to see the gallery that contains all of the images, including the one Thums Up is referring to, go to the top of the page and select "Contest Gallery"
These are all amazing, truly impressed. I think more prizes were needed, awesome honorable mentions also. Congratulations winners.

The last one is the best one in my opinion. I love it 
Wish I won too xD but congrats for the winners ^^ ♡
